guide: Ideally you'd want Ender Set
with a Void Sword for this.
This needs Combat 15 and a completion
of the previous floor to enter.
To efficiently grind this, you should
get help from Party Finder/Friends.
Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
For this you just need to mine blocks,
complete Mining Commissions and collect
occasional Commission Milestones.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchant
guide: Apply/Use the highest tier of Scavenger
that you can get your hands on and put it
on your main weapon. Gifts from the Jerry Island
can be a way to obtain Scavenger IV books.
You can also use the weapon drops from dungeon mobs
as those have guaranteed Scavenger 5.
You can buy this for 400 coins
from the Fish Merchant in the Hub
Fish in the Hub until you can enter the Backwater Bayou.
Fish there and lootshare mobs until you unlock
Fishing Minions. Place as many of them on your island,
as you can and give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and don't forget to collect in time.
You will get the Rock Pet by mining 2.5k
Ore Blocks. Keep in mind that Stone doesn't
count for this. Don't forget to equip the pet ;)
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom, Cactus
and Pumpkin Armor.
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste, Mercenary and
Starlight Armor from Rosetta aswell as Angler Armor
(8 pieces) from the Fishing Merchant,
Chainmail Armor from the Iron Forger and
Canopy Armor from Amaury. You should also
collect the armor from the Foraging Questline.
Complete a Floor 1 with a score of 230+
and buy the chest afterwards. If you can't buy
it on the spot, either save money and buy it
from Croesus within the next 2 days or do another run.
You will probably need help with this.
Mine Pure Gold in the Dwarven Mines
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe.
You might want to use as many minions
as you have access to for this.
Remember to put a compactor in the minions
when you plan on leaving for a while.
Don't forget to fuel the minions,
give them storages and collect them in time.
Recommended for this is Zombie Slayer.
This needs 230 xp, so either:
t1, t2 and 2 t3
or t1 and 9 t2.
Don't forget to claim the rewards
from Maddox.
Fish in the Hub until you can enter the Backwater Bayou.
Fish there and lootshare mobs until you unlock
Fishing Minions. Place as many of them on your island,
as you can and give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and don't forget to collect in time.
Do commissions and events in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You might want to use the Royal Reforge on your
equipment to gain more powder from events.
You can also fish up and kill Mithril Grubbers
in the Abandoned Quarry (Fishing 6).
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
You could consider getting gear from
Galatea like Canopy Armor (requires 1.21
to enter that island)
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop Collection
and requires 40 Enchanted Pork to make.
You can use Minions for this, just
remember to give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and collect in time.
Reforge your Void Sword to Sharp
at the Blacksmith in the Hub or
enchant any weapon with Critical 5.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver
with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow
in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
Claim your cake buff (visit skyerzz, nightlibra or prtl),
hold an angler 4+ rod and visit someone with a
Sea Creature Chance beacon (visit ReyMaratov).
Ways to obtain:
Craft (Lapis Lazuli Collection 5),
a drop from fishing,
from the Experimentation Table,
drop from Ender Nodes in the End (11-13%).
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress once you
talked to Bramass Beastslayer in The Spiders Den.
You will most likely be able to complete this
from doing the Emerald Treasure Goal as there
is a high chance for a t6 Enchanted Book to be
in the given Reward Chests.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.
Use the best fishing rod, bait and armor that you
have access to and fish in the Spiders Den,
ideally during rain/thunder and avoid fishing
IN the hotspots. Recommended is
Angler Armor (or better) and Carrot Bait.
You will need Fishing 15 to be able to fish him up.
Place Fishing Minions and give them the best storage
(and fuel) you have access to.
